title: Adc/Jg Main LFT or a Duo
body:
silver 3/4 adc/Jg main looking for a team or a consistent duo partner 

Adc: Vayne twitch jinx lucian
Jg: Kha'zix udyr irelia hecarim

Hit me up if interested {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body: Hi, I'm Silver 5 and can play support or adc,can play Zyra and Blitz support i want to learn Sona and adc I can play tristana and lucian.
